ns0:entry.ns0:title: [The Verge]These Halloween costumes are AI. Why doesn't anyone care?

ns2:group.ns2:title: These Halloween costumes are AI. Why doesn't anyone care?
ns2:group.ns2:description:
AI videos of Halloween content are taking over social feeds and not even retirement communities are safe. A page dedicated to making AI videos that look like they're from a retirement home had a lot of people convinced they were looking at a genuine video. Here are some more tricky things to look out for with AI.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [TED]A peak in the minds behind true crime #TEDTalks

ns2:group.ns2:title: A peak in the minds behind true crime #TEDTalks
ns2:group.ns2:description: Psychopathic killers are the basis for some must-watch TV, but what really makes them tick? Neuroscientist Jim Fallon talks about brain scans and genetic analysis that may uncover the rotten wiring in the nature (and nurture) of murderers. In a too-strange-for-fiction twist, he shares a fascinating family history that makes his work chillingly personal.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [The Verge]God will be declared by a panel of experts | The Vergecast

ns2:group.ns2:title: God will be declared by a panel of experts | The Vergecast
ns2:group.ns2:description:
If you want to understand the full spectrum of AI software, from â€œstraightforward problem-solving toolâ€ to â€œnever-ending slop machine,â€ all you need to do is pay attention to everything Adobe launched at its conference this week. David and Nilay run through the news, which will change how people use Photoshop but also maybe change our social feeds forever. After that, they talk about OpenAIâ€™s conversion to a for-profit business, and specifically the truly wild way OpenAI and Microsoft talk about the future of AGI. Finally, in the lightning round, they discuss Brendan Carr, Cybertrucks, the Trump Phone, Ghost Posts, and more.
0:00 Introduction 00:25 Surge Protector Safety and Virality 02:28 AI Week and Decoder Video Podcast 03:55 Halloween Plans and Costume Stories 06:25 Adobe's AI Innovations in Creative Tools 12:51 AI's Impact on Creative Workflows 13:45 AI in Audio and the Future of Content Creation 17:17 AI Assistants and Social Media Automation 20:24 The Future of AI-Generated Content 28:11 The Creator Economy and Platform Pressures 35:51 YouTube's Evolution with AI 36:36 The Creator Economy Crisis 36:54 The Rise of Algorithmic Content 37:14 The Impact of AI on Social Media 38:12 The SOA Phenomenon 43:19 The OpenAI Restructuring 46:10 The AI Hype and Financial Implications 47:12 The Press Release Breakdown 48:40 The Expert Panel for AGI 50:19 Microsoft's Role in AI Development 01:03:36 The AI Economy and Future Predictions 01:06:57 Brendan Carr's Broadband Nutrition Labels Controversy 01:09:28 FCC's Controversial Rule-making 01:11:15 Anna Gomez's Fiery Response 01:13:34 The New York Times Connections Controversy 01:17:39 AOL's Ownership Saga 01:21:03 The Elusive Trump Phone 01:30:58 Samsung Fridges with Ads is as Bad as You Think 01:38:54 Upcoming Episodes and Conclusion

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Apple Developer]Press Start: Game development on Apple platforms | Meet with Apple

ns2:group.ns2:title: Press Start: Game development on Apple platforms | Meet with Apple
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Learn to unlock the full potential of game development for iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and visionOS in this all-day online activity streaming from Cupertino. Whether youâ€™re porting a PC or console title, crafting a mobile masterpiece, or augmenting your game with cutting-edge features, these in-depth sessions will help you find success in the Apple ecosystem. You'll learn how to leverage Metal, optimize for Apple silicon, design compelling handheld experiences, and navigate the App Store to reach millions of players. Conducted in English.
Agenda: (All times PT)
10:00 a.m. - 12:30 p.m.: Morning session - Press Start: Games on Apple platforms - Chart your course to Apple platforms - Level up with Apple game technologies - Bring your PC and console games to Mac - Power, performance, and scale on iPhone and iPad - Design great interfaces for handheld games
12:30 p.m. - 1:30 p.m.: Lunch break
1:30 p.m. - 3:30 p.m.: Afternoon session - Transform your game with Apple Vision Pro - Unlock success with premium games on the App Store - Boost discoverability and engagement with the Apple Games app - Explore curation and featuring on the App Store
3:30 p.m. - 4:00 p.m.: Q&A
To explore additional sessions, appointments, and workshops, view the full schedule of Meet with Apple activities worldwide. https://apple.co/Meet-with-Apple
More Apple Developer resources: Video sessions: https://apple.co/VideoSessions Documentation: https://apple.co/DeveloperDocs Forums: https://apple.co/DeveloperForums App: https://apple.co/DeveloperApp

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [TED]The line between contagion and connection is much thinner than you may realize

ns2:group.ns2:title: The line between contagion and connection is much thinner than you may realize
ns2:group.ns2:description: After a mysterious wave of tics and twitches swept through a small-town high school in New York, documentary podcaster Dan Taberski set out to investigate what was really happening. Drawing on extensive research and intimate interviews with the people involved, he explores the roots of mass hysteria â€” and what it reveals about the line between illness and belonging. What happens when the very thing that makes us sick ... is also what connects us?

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [MacRumors]The M5 Vision Pro is What Apple Shouldâ€™ve Shipped First

ns2:group.ns2:title: The M5 Vision Pro is What Apple Shouldâ€™ve Shipped First
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Appleâ€™s new M5 Vision Pro is here, and while it might look the same on the outside, the inside is a different story. With the new M5 chip, visionOS 26, and a redesigned Dual Knit Band, this version finally delivers the performance, comfort, and realism Apple promised the first time around.
In this hands-on, I go over whatâ€™s new â€” from faster Persona creation and nearly instant spatial photo rendering, to the improved Mac Virtual Display that now feels like two 5K monitors floating in your space. I also talk about how the new band changes comfort, the re-tuned audio, battery life, and how visionOS 26 ties it all together with smarter widgets, better collaboration, and smoother control.
If youâ€™ve been waiting for the Vision Pro to truly feel like a complete product, this is it.

ns2:group.ns2:title: 360 camera comparison
ns2:group.ns2:description:
I tried out the GoPro Max 2 camera to compare it directly with the Insta360 X5 and the original GoPro Max 1. The differences in image quality and color sciences didn't immediately jump out to me like they sometimes do. Some shots with the Insta X5 look more magenta than the Max 2. Both cameras handled exposure and white balance slightly differently depending on the shooting conditions and it wasn't always consistent or was fairly subtle. Overall, I feel like the best way to decide on these kinds of cameras is to try renting one and see which workflow works best for you.

ns2:group.ns2:description:
Building Agentic AI Applications with Neptune MCP: A Practical Guide
This technical walkthrough demonstrates how to rapidly develop AI-powered graph applications using AWS Strands SDK and Neptune MCP server, enabling developers to create intelligent, graph-based solutions efficiently.
Technical Overview: â€¢ Setting up Neptune MCP server environment â€¢ Integrating AWS Strands SDK components â€¢ Implementing agentic behavior patterns â€¢ Configuring graph-based AI interactions
The demonstration covers: â€¢ Basic setup and configuration â€¢ Core API implementation â€¢ Agent behavior definition â€¢ Graph query integration
Key Implementation Steps: â€¢ Environment initialization â€¢ Graph schema design â€¢ Agent configuration
Practical Applications: â€¢ Intelligent data analysis â€¢ Automated decision systems â€¢ Knowledge graph navigation â€¢ Dynamic relationship mapping
This guide is designed for developers and architects working with: â€¢ Graph databases â€¢ AI/ML systems â€¢ Knowledge graphs â€¢ Automated reasoning systems

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [TED]The Hidden Cost of Buying Gold | Claudia Vega | TED

ns2:group.ns2:title: The Hidden Cost of Buying Gold | Claudia Vega | TED
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Gold may glitter, but the hidden cost of mining it is devastating. Amazon researcher and TED Fellow Claudia Vega exposes how mercury pollution from artisanal gold mining poisons local communities and destroys rainforests â€” and shows why protecting the planet is far more valuable than any treasure.
